name: Auto Accidents
description: Auto collisions can affect any age demographic. On average, a car crash kills a person every 12 minutes in the United States. In particular, the highest risk age groups most likely affected by car accidents tend to be people between the ages of 15 and 24 and those over 75.

name: Sex Crimes
description: Being accused of a sex crime can have life changing implications. There are few crimes that have the potential to damage one’s reputation and quality of life as much as a sex crime. The conviction of even a minor sex crime can deliver harsh consequences that may follow you for the rest of your life

name: Criminal Defense
description: When you are facing severe criminal charges that may have the ability to change your life indefinitely, you need The Villages criminal defense lawyer who is familiar with the criminal justice system as well as the people who work in it. Selecting a seasoned, aggressive and distinguished criminal defense lawyer to represent your case is the first step in meeting the challenges of being accused of any type of crime. The Law Offices of Whittel & Melton are comprised of respected criminal defense lawyers in The Villages, practiced forensic experts and licensed investigators who are dedicated to protecting and advocating our clients

name: Wrongful Death
description: Losing a loved one due to another person’s careless or negligent behavior can be devastating. When someone is killed in a wrongful death accident, family members suddenly suffer the loss of love, friendship, security, guidance and possibly even financial support. In addition to dealing with the emotional grief, family members must focus on moving into the future without someone they are used to having around. In these tough times,

name: Truck Accident Lawyer
description: Were you hurt in a collision with a large commercial vehicle in The Villages, Florida? Did you lose a loved one due to a truck driver's negligent actions on the road? If so, you may be entitled to compensation and we are here to help. Contact a The Villages truck accident attorney at Whittel & Melton today to discuss your options for filing a personal injury claim. Our attorneys will investigate the scene of the accident, speak to those responsible along with witnesses and police officers, and work tirelessly to help you obtain justice for your pain and suffering

name: Worthless Checks
description: Settlements, Arbitrations and Mediation. Experienced Malpractice Attorney (Lawyer, Medical, CPA, Real Estate), Debt & Judgment Collection. Personal Injury and other civil litigation experienced. No Frivolous Cases, Ever.

name: Social Security Disability
description: Do you need help filing an initial application for SSD benefits? Do you need to file an appeal for a denied claim? Whatever your needs, we are proud to be able to offer you expert legal assistance navigating this complex system.

name: Workers' Compensation
description: A workplace injury can be devastating. Not only could your injuries leave you unable to perform your job in the short term, but you may have doubts about when and if you will ever be able to get back to work. Along with an uncertain future, you are likely facing the financial strains of keeping up with your household bills, rent or mortgage, and car payments, while at the same time the costs associated with your injury – doctors, medication, rehabilitation – are mounting.
